group_1.textRight: Mmm... The pancakes here are so good!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah, they're so good! They're so light@and fluffy!

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes... [chara:200501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200501:cheek_0][chara:200501:face_mtn_ex_001.exp.json][chara:200501:lipSynch_1]Ahem...
Homura...
Why do you want to go?
It's already dangerous enough dealing with@the Witches here in Mitakihara.
Kamihama is a strange place. Many bizarre@things are happening there.
Why do you want to go so badly that you're@willing to take on such a risk?
I'm sorry.
Maybe that was a bit harsh.

group_1.textLeft: But Kamihama... Is it really that dangerous?
When you took me there, Mami...
The Witches were powerful, not to mention@there were lots of them...

group_1.textRight: There were.

group_1.textLeft: Sure they were tough, but even I was able@to defeat them...
It didn't seem like that dangerous of@a place...

group_1.textRight: The situation's completely different now.
I've been there many times since then... @I've seen a lot...
Well, first... In addition to Witches,@there are Rumors and Uwasa.

group_1.textLeft: A rumor, like stories passed from person@to person...kind of like urban legends?

group_1.textRight: Yes, except the rumors in Kamihama take a@physical form...called Uwasa.
Just like a Witch...

group_1.textLeft: That has to be the work of Witches, right?
Or could it be something else?

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure... I assume it is Witches.
But there's another strange thing there.
A Witch that's taken on the form of a person.
It looks completely human. What's worse@is it's taken on the form of a Magical Girl.
But I wasn't fooled... I could clearly tell@it was a Witch.
An extremely powerful oneâ€¦ It would be @difficult to defeat.

group_1.narration: An increase in Witches...@Mysterious things called Uwasa...
And a Witch that looks like a Magical Girl...
I knew it... @There's something going on in Kamihama!

group_1.textRight: In other words, on top of Witches, we have@two other types of enemies...
And that Witch pretending to be a human...
It's managed to blend in perfectly.
Even the Magical Girls it's with haven't@seemed to notice...
I'm planning to look into the Uwasa first.
There's a chance they might start appearing@in Mitakihara as well.
We need to do our best to keep them in@check...
So for the time being, you should stay away@from Kamihama...
